TopicTitle: Lagging badly when on orbital rendez vous

Articles.Content:
I have a station in high orbit. Everything is fine. I can jump to it forth and back from the tracking station.

But when I try to rendez-vous with it, as soon as i get closer than 2.3 km the game starts lagging badly and the station cannot be selected anymore.

Anyone with the same bug?

Also, where do I find the error log in this game?

EDIT - PROBLEM SOLVED

Found the error log.

After a fast read I was able to track the problem to Scansat dev build 9 release candidate 4 and Scansat Contracts (that use Contract Configurator). Updating both to latest versions solved the problem.

Edited January 29, 2015 by Cocox
